author: Zack Budryk
title: Nigeria issues warning for drug touted by Trump after overdoses
description: Nigerian health officials on Monday issued a warning about chloroquine, an anti-malarial drug President Trump has repeatedly touted as a possible coronavirus treatment, saying three people have overdosed on it.Lago...
